item.title: Germany and France warn Trump over threat to take over Greenland
item.description: The EU's two leading members were reacting to the US president-elect's plans to acquire Denmark's autonomous territory.

item.title: US slaps sanctions on close aide to Hungary's Viktor Orban
item.description: Antal Rogan is one of the most powerful men in Orban's government and heads his cabinet office.

item.title: Where is Greenland and why does Trump want it?
item.description: Though the president-elect's rhetoric is unusual, for over a century a succession of US presidents have tried to gain control of Greenland.

item.title: Huge problems with axing fact-checkers, Meta oversight board says
item.description: The body's co-chair says moving to community notes could have a big impact on gender rights and minority groups.

item.title: High winds, lack of rain and climate change stoking California fires
item.description: Experts say that rising global temperatures are making wild fires more likely in California.
